channel.title: How to save your characters appearence?
channel.description: [glow=blue,2,300][/glow]Everytime i change my appearence and log out, my character changes back...how do i fix this ?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 11:10:36 PM[/size][hr][quote="xXOwnage"][glow=blue,2,300][/glow]Everytime i change my appearence and log out, my character changes back...how do i fix this ?[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 12:06:18 AM[/size][hr]Does anyone not know how to do this ?

item.title: How to save your characters appearence?
item.dc:creator: @xXOwnage xXOwnage
item.description:
@xXOwnage wrote:

Ok, we got the command working for it and it comes up and lets you change it, but now we cant save them…everytime we logout they change back >.<

Read full topic
